section.p: Camera stabilization mode is disabled by default. You need to call this method to enable stabilization and set the appropriate mode.

ul.li: Camera stabilization applies only to video resolutions greater than 1280 Ã— 720.

The higher the stabilization level, the smaller the field of view and the higher the latency. To improve user experience, it is recommended to set the mode parameter to CAMERA_STABILIZATION_MODE_LEVEL_1.
This method applies to iOS only.

section.title: Scenario
section.p: In mobile shooting, low-light environments, or when using mobile devices, you can set the camera stabilization mode to reduce shake and obtain more stable and clearer images.

section.title: Timing
section.p: You must call this method after the camera is successfully started, that is, when the SDK triggers the callback and returns the local video state as LOCAL_VIDEO_STREAM_STATE_CAPTURING (1).
